H0.text: Who is the patron saint of lost causes. St. Anthony of Padua

H1.text: Who is the patron saint of lost causes. St. Rita of Cascia

H2.text: Who is the patron saint of lost causes. St. Philomena

H3.text: Who is the patron saint of lost causes. St Jude

A4.text: In the Catholic Church, he is the patron saint of desperate cases and lost causes.
